snippet: Reginald Johnson scored 15 points and made two critical defensive plays late in the game to lead Hampton to a win over Manhattan in an N.C.A.A. tournament play-in game in Dayton, Ohio.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Hampton University defeats Manhattan College, 74-64, in first round of the NCAA basketball tournament; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Reginald Johnson scored 15 points and made two critical defensive plays late in the game to lead Hampton to a win over Manhattan in an N.C.A.A. tournament play-in game in Dayton, Ohio.

headline.print_headline: Hampton Earns a Shot at Kentucky
headline.main: Hampton Earns a Shot at Kentucky
